title: The Smell of Hamburg
description: If you like Murakami, Borges, Italo Calvino, Cortázar, Bolaño and similar writers then you will like my collection of short stories. It is a literary fiction about people, love, hate, fear, freedom, search of identity, magical realism and storytelling.A love triangle between a woman, her husband and her lover. London, rain and passion analysts.A marketing student is sent to a small town in Germany where she has to sit on the jury of the local art competition. She meditates on approaching beauty to the utmost possible extent and commits a crime.A young woman living on a tropical island on the verge of adultery.A librarian in Barcelona scans a picture of a mysterious ship that haunts him and leads to an unknown community residing in the old town of Barcelona and hiding a secret about the librarian’s true identity.
author: Barbara Sea
